channel.title: Testing animations of NPCs?
channel.description:
Hello there.
How would i go about finding out animations myself? Like, doing something in the game, and it printing in the batch. I know how to use a println, but i don't know how to find out the animation of an NPC. Can someone help me here.
Much appreciation! WRX`
